snippet.title: Security vs. Nations: a lost battle? Sécurité contre nations : une bataille perdue ?
snippet.description: Security vs. Nations: a lost battle? Sécurité contre nations : une bataille perdue ? / Computer Security Team “Know the enemy” is one of the basic recommendations of the ancient Chinese military strategist Sun Tzu (544–496 BC). In the cyber-world, the usual suspects are not only script kiddies, criminals and hacktivists, but also nation states. [...] BUL-NA-2013-270.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 52/2013 01/2014 02/2014 03/2014

snippet.title: Game data analysis : tools and methods
snippet.description: Game data analysis : tools and methods / Coupart, Thibault This book features an introduction to the basic theoretical tenets of data analysis from a game developer's point of view, as well as a practical guide to performing gameplay analysis on a real-world game.This book is ideal for video game developers who want to try and experiment with the game analytics approach for their own productions [...] Birmingham : Packt Publ., 2013. - 86 p.

snippet.title: Networked life : 20 questions and answers
snippet.description: Networked life : 20 questions and answers / Chiang, Mung Cambridge : Cambridge University Press, 2012.

snippet.title: A 7500 km journey on a solar-powered bicycle: show solidarity with their efforts 7500 km en vélo électrique solaire : montrez votre solidarité avec leurs efforts
snippet.description: A 7500 km journey on a solar-powered bicycle: show solidarity with their efforts 7500 km en vélo électrique solaire : montrez votre solidarité avec leurs efforts / Staff Association Our two colleagues, Celine and John, in a little less than four weeks have already travelled almost 2500 km of their 7,500 km-long journey on solar-electric bike, where they plan to cycle from Geneva to Astana (Kazakhstan) via Sochi (in Russia, a mandatory stop). With their efforts they want to promote solar and eco-mobility, particularly travel by "solar powered" bike [...] BUL-SA-2013-116.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 29/2013 30/2013 Fulltext: Roumanie_image \- GIF; Carte12-07-2013_image \- GIF; Carte12.07.2013_image \- GIF; vacances_image \- GIF; Budapest_image \- GIF;

snippet.title: 7500 km journey with their solar-powered bicycles: show your solidarity with their efforts 7500 km en vélo électrique solaire : soyez solidaires de leurs efforts
snippet.description: 7500 km journey with their solar-powered bicycles: show your solidarity with their efforts 7500 km en vélo électrique solaire : soyez solidaires de leurs efforts / Staff Association Our colleagues, Céline and Jean, are currently on a 7500 km journey from Geneva to Astana (Kazakhstan) via Sotchi (in Russia, mandatory stopover) to promote ecology with their solar-powered bicycles. In the context of their trip, they asked the Staff Association to launch an action of solidarity in the framework of the Long-Term Collections. [...] BUL-SA-2013-106.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 27/2013 28/2013 Fulltext: Montage_image \- GIF; Ljubljana_image \- GIF; Carte_image \- GIF;

snippet.title: Content, Clarity and Charisma Contenu, clarté et charisme
snippet.description: Content, Clarity and Charisma Contenu, clarté et charisme / Antonella Del Rosso The winning recipe of FameLab is all in the three Cs that are written on the evaluation chart of the judges. If you are a young researcher and dream of communicating your science to the public in a TV-like setting, challenge yourself with the FameLab golden rules and give an amazing three-minute speech at the next FameLab competition in any of the participating countries. [...] BUL-NA-2013-126.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 25/2013 26/2013 Fulltext: JPG;

snippet.title: The Staff Association has a new look and is modernizing itself The Staff Association has a new look and is modernizing itself
snippet.description: The Staff Association has a new look and is modernizing itself The Staff Association has a new look and is modernizing itself / Staff Association The Staff Association through its In-Form-Action Commission has worked to modernize its image, giving it at the same time a more professional look. In addition this year, the Staff Council has defined a new structure with 45 delegates that will take effect from 2014. [...] BUL-SA-2013-079.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 19/2013 20/2013

snippet.title: L’Association change de « peau » et se modernise ! L’Association change de « peau » et se modernise !
snippet.description: L’Association change de « peau » et se modernise ! L’Association change de « peau » et se modernise ! / Staff Association L’Association du personnel à travers sa Commission permanente Informaction a travaillé pour moderniser son image tout en la rendant plus professionnelle. En complément, le Conseil du personnel a défini, cette année, une nouvelle structure avec 45 délégués qui devrait entrer en vigueur l’an prochain. [...] BUL-SA-2013-067.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 17/2013 18/2013

snippet.title: The Staff Association: because you’re worth it L’Association du personnel : parce que vous le valez bien
snippet.description: The Staff Association: because you’re worth it L’Association du personnel : parce que vous le valez bien / CERN Bulletin A new logo, a new website and now we’re on Facebook: the members of the rejuvenated Staff Association of CERN want to take this opportunity to remind you that the SA is open to everyone. All you have to do is join [...] BUL-NA-2013-066.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 15/2013 16/2013 Fulltext: JPG;

snippet.title: The Passport to the Big Bang: a trail of discovery of CERN and its sites Le Passeport Big Bang, un parcours pour découvrir le CERN et son territoire
snippet.description: The Passport to the Big Bang: a trail of discovery of CERN and its sites Le Passeport Big Bang, un parcours pour découvrir le CERN et son territoire / CERN Bulletin Sunday 2 June 2013 will see the launch of CERN’s Passport to the Big Bang, a scientific tourist trail linking ten of the Laboratory’s sites in the Pays de Gex and the Canton of Geneva. CERN is organising a public event to celebrate the launch and needs lots of volunteers – you could be one of them! The exhibition platform in Sergy, in front of the ALICE experiment [...] BUL-NA-2013-063.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 15/2013 16/2013 Fulltext: JPG;
